content.rendered:
project
KCC
client
Vinod Jadhav
location
Nagpur, India
duration
07 Days

branding

KCC is a pioneer in infrastructure development, delivering innovative and cost-effective solutions since 1985. Their focus on quality and a client-first approach has set benchmarks in the infrastructure and irrigation sectors.
concept
The branding aims to honor KCC's enduring legacy while emphasizing its forward-thinking approach.
challenge
The logo had to balance the company’s rich history with its modern outlook and values.
solution
We designed a minimalist logo featuring clean typography and a rich color palette. The branding honors KCC’s enduring legacy while emphasizing its forward-thinking approach.

website
